name: Bridgedale Ski Midweight + Socks - Women's
description: Combines lovely merino wool with technical fibres to balance insulation with comfort. These midweight socks offer plenty of warmth and cushioning for long days in your boots.Made of merino wool, Endurofil polypropylene, nylon and LYCRA® for warmth and moisture management.Full terry knit foot for added warmth and cushioning with padding through toes, heels, shins and calves.Elasticated arch support prevents bunching and provides a performance fit.Flat toe seam for added comfort.Women's fit is slimmer with a narrow toebox and heel.
